text: ge belee wanga gi digau ala e lodo huaidu i Zion di tenetene mo di manawa lamalia, ge e huli nadau manawa gee, e wanga gi digaula taahili hagaamu, e huli nadau lodo huaidu. Digaula gaa hai be nia laagau ala ne bida dogi hua go Dimaadua. Digaula huogodoo gaa hai nia mee ala e donu. Gei nia daangada ga hagaamu Dimaadua i ana mee ala ne hai.
